name.description: The name of the location (preferably in English)

local_name.description: Location name in the language local to where the location is located, provided by the claimant

description.description: Description of the location provided by the claimant

country.description: The country of the location (can be a country code or name see https://www.iban.com/country-codes)

business_url.description: The location website url, provided by the claimant

sector.description: The sector that the location operates in

parent_company.description: The name of the parent company of the location

product_type.description: The product types that the location produces

location_type.description: The type of location this location represents

processing_type.description: The type of processing activity that takes place at this location

number_of_workers.description: The number of workers that are employed at a location

minimum_order_quantity.description: Indicates the minimum order quantity accepted by the location

average_lead_time.description: The minimum time that a location needs to produce an order

percent_female_workers.description: The percentage of female employees at the location

affiliations.description: Indicates if the location is affiliated with any industry initiatives

certifications_standards_regulations.description: Indicates if the location is compliant with any certification, standards, or regulations
